title: Photographers, Your Dream Shot Is About to Become a Reality
text:
Wix Photography \ FEB 22nd 2017 Photographers, Your Dream Shot Is About to Become a Reality 
Everyone dreams. But photographers’ dreams are strikingly different: they are only one shot away from becoming a reality. Each breathtaking photo started as a bold fantasy in an artist’s brilliant mind – be it a volcano crater, a humpback whale, or a bearer of a nearly lost culture. 
But the truth is, most of us are bound to reality’s constraints. Budget, resources, lack of equipment and free time make it nearly impossible to actually give life to your dream photograph. This is where Wix comes in: we want to take the load of restrictions off your shoulders, to make room for your camera backpack and the adventure of a lifetime. The sky is no longer the limit 
“Make your life a dream, and your dream a reality,” said Antoine de Saint-Exupéry. The first part of the quote is on you, and for the next two weeks – the second part is on us: 
In the Capture Your Dream Photo contest launching today, we invite photographers from all over the world to submit their most daring ideas for a chance to make their dream photo shoot a reality. The author of the most inspiring entry will get to realize their dream project from start to stunning, wherever and whatever it may take. How do I participate? 
As a photographer, you already know how to seize the moment. Prove it! All you need to do is: Show off your best work by submitting your Wix portfolio website. Describe your dream photo That moment you’ve always wanted to capture. Anywhere, anytime, with any equipment – there are no limits to how big your dream can be. The rest is on us! Wix will take care of the entire production’s costs and details to make it happen. 
If you don’t have a Wix website yet, don’t worry: creating a unique portfolio with Wix is very easy. Simply choose a free photography template on Wix.com, upload your photos, hit “Publish” – and that’s it! Need help? Look no further than our step-by-step guide to creating a complete photography website . 
Dreams were meant to come true. Enter now and make yours a reality. 
* The contest runs from February 22nd to March 8th (included). We will announce the winner on March 9th. For contest rules, click here . SHARE:
